problem_text_cn: 如图,一个圆锥的侧面展开图是半径为10的半圆,则它的底面半径是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the expanded figure of the lateral surface of a cone is a semicircle with a radius of N_0, then the radius of its bottom is ()
raw_answer: 解:设圆锥的底面半径为r,根据题意得\frac{1}{2}•2π•r•10=\frac{180\cdotπ\cdot10^{2}}{360},解得r=5,即圆锥的底面半径为5．故选:C．
